name: Nathan Quickstart 6L Race Vest - Unisex
description:
A low-profile, minimalist way to comfortably carry your water and bring other essentials on a run, race training session. With a total capacity of 6L, the pack has enough room for a small jacket and extra snacks.2L hydration bladder included.7 storage pocketsFront smartphone pocket has a sweat-resistant lining to protect phone from moisture.Main back zippered pocket fits extra layers.Adjustable front and side straps.Soft perimeter binding prevents chafing.
reflective hits.Weight of back with reservoir is 274g.
